entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is mentioned as the one who is disappointed in the student.

entities.name: gryffindor tower
entities.description: Gryffindor Tower is a location within Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry where students from Gryffindor house reside. It is mentioned as the place where students are finishing their feast.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is mentioned as leaving Gryffindor Tower.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall tells the student to get off to Gryffindor Tower, indicating that it is a location where students reside.
Hermione leaves Gryffindor Tower, indicating her departure from the location.
